name: save_markdown
description: Save markdown content as an artifact in the project. Use this tool when you need to create a new markdown document.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the project to save the artifact in

artifact_id.description: Unique identifier of the saved artifact

s3_bucket.description: S3 bucket where the artifact is stored

s3_key.description: S3 object key where the artifact is stored

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the artifact was created

name: load_markdown
description: Load an existing markdown artifact from the project. Use this tool when you need to read a previously saved markdown document.

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the markdown artifact to load

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the artifact was created

name: edit_markdown
description: Edit an existing markdown artifact's content. Use this tool when you need to update the content of a previously saved markdown document.

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the markdown artifact to edit
Unique identifier of the edited artifact

s3_bucket.description: S3 bucket where the artifact is stored

s3_key.description: S3 object key where the artifact is stored

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the artifact was updated
